long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Social Tinder is a tool designed for individuals involved in influencer marketing. It streamlines the workflow for marketers by helping them select relevant bloggers and apply tags.

How to Use

1. Use the shortcut Ctrl+Shift+J (on Windows) or Cmd+Option+J (on Mac) to open the DevTools console.
2. Locate the Tinder panel at the top among other tabs, such as Elements and Console.
3. Click on the Tinder panel.
4. Ensure that DevTools resembles the screenshot. It is preferable to pin it on the left or right side.
5. Create a copy of Google Sheets ( https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/13fNgXmoLapN_jcPyIA26_CUgXJvGqwAJJw-28ea0TYU/edit#gid=0 ), link to your Google Sheets document with your own links and tags. Important! Only modify the data in the columns (links or tag names), not the table structure.
6. Paste the link to your Google Sheet into the Tinder field and click "Обработать" (Process).
7. Use Tinder: Click "Вперед" (Forward) or "Назад" (Back), check "Да" (Yes) or "Нет" (No), apply tags, and you will see your results in the uploaded Google Sheets (Result List).

Rate Us

If you find Social Tinder useful, please share with your friends!
